title: Urgent Opening For Invoice Matching
tagsAndSkills: Invoice matching,Invoice Processing,Payment Processing,Accounts Payable,Procure To Pay,PTP,P2P,Process
jobDescription:
Role & responsibilities


Geetings From Peoplefy!!!!


We are looking for Immediate Joiners

  • Assist in invoice matching activities, verifying purchase orders, invoices, and receiving reports to ensure accuracy and resolve discrepancies under supervision.
  • Support invoice processing tasks, including verifying invoice details, coding expenses, and obtaining necessary approvals for payment.
  • Aid in payment processing activities, such as scheduling payments and processing checks, under guidance from senior team members.
  • Assist with manual handling of invoices, including scanning, indexing, and filing physical documents, following established procedures and guidelines.
  • Collaborate with team members to reconcile discrepancies in invoice matching, investigating, and resolving issues in a timely manner.
  • Assist in maintaining accurate records of invoice matching activities, ensuring documentation is up to date and easily accessible for audits.

Interested candidates share your CV on following Email Id asha.ch@peoplefy.com

ambitionBoxData.Title: Yaashkrishni Food Science Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
Company Name : YaashKrishni Food Science Ltd (Ribbons and Balloons)

Name of the Position : Manager Purchase

Department : Purchase

Roles and Responsibilities:

  • Design, plan and implement sourcing and purchasing strategies
  • Managing daily purchasing activities, Track and report key functional metrics to reduce expenses and improve effectiveness.
  • Craft negotiation strategies and close deals with optimal terms.
  • Forecast price and market trends to identify changes of balance in buyer-supplier power.
  • Maintaining the supplier database, purchase records, and related documentation.
  • Coordinating with inventory control to determine and manage inventory needs.
  • Work with suppliers, manufacturers and internal departments
  • Determine Quantity, Quality and timing of deliveries.
  • Monitor and forecast upcoming levels of demand.
  • Determine and track KPIs
  • Provide reports for upper management
  • Adhere to laws, rules and regulations

title: Logistics Manager
tagsAndSkills: Logistics Operations,Supply Chain Operations,Fleet Management,Logistics Planning,Transport Operations,Fleet,Supply chain,Transportation Operations
jobDescription:
Hiring for Logistics Manager for our Top marine shipping client

Location - Turbhe

Experience 5 to 10 years


KEY ACCOUNTABLES

To take charge of After sales market i.e After Order complete processing of Order.

Accountable for timely dispatch of Shipments from Suppliers warehouse to Ships Agent.

Interacting with MNC clients, Suppliers & Forwarders Worldwide via email & Telecom.

Ensuring Active generation of Invoices & ensuring payments from Clients are received in

timely manner.

To build Good Vendor relations, take payment terms from new suppliers & ensure they are paid

as per agreed terms.


REQUIRED SKILLS

Assistant manager with at least 4-5 years of Logistics or Freight forwarding experience in Trading house or equivalent.

Self-Leaner and ability to grasp concepts, with positive attitude.

Excellent Academic Performance.

Good Communication & ability to grow in the Industry.

Good knowledge of excel & Word. MIS reporting.

Ability to take pressure and work under pressure


Can call sweeta on 022-40108494 or share your cv on sweeta@focusonIT.com
